title: STOOP CRUSH US ROIT....0% problem crush
body: I get ban 20 min 3 time becouse roit crush me what i do i try to back to the game but you stell crush me i hope u can help me and another players we rly neeed you'r  suppot

replies.body: i and all rely wont you'r support league of legends becouse i love the game but u make me to hate it please fast support ( i neeeeeeeeeeed support) pleaseeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
lol, for sure you won' t solve anything with this attitude

Your leaverbuster will continue to escalate until you resolve whatever is causing you to leave.  I'd like to help, but will need some clear details on your issue.  What exactly is happening and when?  Are you receiving any error messages?  Anything can help!
Tbh, im tired of this. Porocles can u pls remove or make a filter to not see help and supprt post in riot comments section. Not everyone wants to see another guy's issue. Please.
I know. But everytime i see the red posts area all i see is help and support posts and that makes it difficult to see the other posts of a significant relevance to more than 1 player.

(look what happend  to me ) i select the champion no problem ........... but  when i join to the loading game to the Battle  the game stop at 0% and the game Continue crushing to the end (what i can do) 3 time ban ............. i ill send to u a video In the fastest time
and (Thanks for attention)
and the message like....(network warring)........(You have disconnected . please check your internet connection and try again ) and my internet working 100%
